mapper.insert: insert into setmeal(id,category_id, name, price, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user,status) values (#{id},#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser},'0')
mapper.select: select status from setmeal where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update setmeal set status=#{status},update_time=now() where id=#{id}
